disease_risks.name: Blast Disease
disease_risks.description: Fungal disease causing diamond-shaped lesions on leaves

preventive_actions: Increase monitoring frequency to twice weekly
Remove and destroy infected plants immediately
Ensure adequate plant spacing for air circulation
Apply sticky traps to monitor insect populations
Spray Trichoderma for fungal disease prevention
